snippet: German authorities said they had broken up a group that was trying to provide support to neo-Nazis behind bars.
abstract: German authorities say they have broken up group intending to provide support to neo-Nazis serving time in prison; existence of group casts doubt on Germany's efforts to crack down on far right after high-profile incident in which neo-Nazi group calling itself the National Socialist Underground engaged in several racially-motivated killings.
lead_paragraph: German authorities said they had broken up a group that was trying to provide support to neo-Nazis behind bars.

headline.seo: German Neo-Nazis Accused of Organizing in Prisons
headline.main: Neo-Nazis Organizing in Prisons in Germany
headline.print_headline: Neo-Nazis Organizing In Prisons In Germany
